quest.name: Flowers of Fury
journal:
 Quest Sync
The pixie flowerkeep is seething with fury.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: Grrr, I am flapping mad right now! Some wicked mortals snuck into Il Mheg and tried to steal our flowers!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: I used illusions to send them on their way, but instead of learning their lesson, they went and poked my friends with cold, pointy metal!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: It's unforgivable! Those brazen wretches must be punished, and you'll come and punish them with me!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: Good! Now, to make it interesting, let us make this a race: the first to dole out punishment wins. The villains fled to the southwest─let's go and get them!

dialogue.name: BARBARIAN03394
dialogue.text: Who are you!? The bloody pixies' minion!?

dialogue.name: BOORISH03394
dialogue.text: The flowers are gonna make me rich! Piss off or else!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: What, you're done punishing them already!? Wow, you're swifter than a salamander!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: At any rate, justice has been served, and I doubt those mortals will try anything again. Come, let us return to Lydha Lran.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, we may enjoy our beautiful flowers in peace again.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: But I must say, I'm a little disappointed that I lost our little race.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03394
dialogue.text: I was planning to turn those thieves into leafmen, and then they could have amused me forever and ever. If you should see them again, tell them to come back!
